Reviews.Title: “Overbooked”

Reviews.Content: friend reservation july 11 friend check overbooked moved hotel hotel parallel street wherever sent perfectly fine lived expectations near metro station sum nice booked silken concordia

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel in great area”
Reviews.Author: gkgemmell65
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights silken concordia impressed hotel situated poble sec metro stop green line 3 handy visiting match nou camp line 3 5 stops metro hotel situated ideal walking las ramblas port beach 15 20 min walk oliver reception helpful regards tours visit bars etc seventh time visited barcelona recent hotel return due location cost helpfullness staff

Reviews.Title: “lovely room with modern look”
Reviews.Author: audrey151
Reviews.Content: doubleroom looked decentlysized toilet airy bathtub pity reception staff didnt helping night ac wasnt phone desk response guy couldnt help couldnt leave desk morning trip inquire issue response ac doesnt winter window warm strangely night ac decided blow cold air unlike hot air constantly emitted night mind settings mode breakfast costs hefty 950 euros selection decent wide array breads pastries cold cuts cured meats hot dishes

Reviews.Title: “Decent size rooms, hard beds, so so staff, great breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: genjisan
Reviews.Content: 2nd time barcelona time stayed avenue town overall fine staff friendlier thats spanish culture operating safe hour help instructions soo wrong youre safe youll probably help lot eateries hotel wont metro super convenient street pretty subways stop midnight sucks party town hours called didnt chance try convenient hotel close las ramblas nice decent fridge nice bottled waters 2 twin beds double nice traveling friend beds hard tried padding 2 thermal blankets hard huge bathroom awesome weird smells throughout hotel bad concentrated glade air fresheners im biggest fan breakfast included package yummy assortment croissants toast pastry yogurt cereal sausage tea coffee oj juices favorite eggs frittata potatoes

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant surprise”
Reviews.Author: vacati0nnati0n
Reviews.Content: paid 3 star restaurant barcelona 5 star ordinary 3 star location west las tons affordable restaurants cafes caferestaurant lobby reasonable rates plenty choices diagonal avenue tricky located diagonal avenue location website spanish maps clean staff friendly complaint maids entered twice 940am view comfortable modern liked alot close poble sec station blocks south spanish plaza

Reviews.Title: “Great little vacation”
Reviews.Author: Yezza
Reviews.Content: hotel nice clean quiet comfortable location bus metro station front hotel airport staff friendly helpfull help short city break price hotel lot stores restaurants specially pastry dino pan enjoyed 5 days slept baby cute cot heating

Reviews.Title: “Very modern and simple”
Reviews.Author: Shawn215
Reviews.Content: stayed days barcelona las ramblas minutes plus seeing neighborhoods tourist section nice hotel pretty simple clean safe nice front desk employees helpful english wouldnt found sitges wasnt dont beaches barcelona train sitges

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wazza08
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel location poble sec directly street metro stop lots nice little bakeries cages nearby clean tidy downside bed matresses pretty hard overall value money stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, good location & rooms perfect”
Reviews.Author: MScoyne
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel 1130am ready helpful staff english helpful hotel sec metro station handy dont hotel 8 10 min walk la 10min walk marina location €5 €7 taxi la clean warm finished uptodate style bathroom bath shower gels accesories safe hotel couldnt staff day left leave bags ticket secure left recommend hotel location freindly staff clean feels 3 star maybe

Reviews.Title: “Ok Hotel - served the purpose”
Reviews.Author: jesann
Reviews.Content: hotel avinguda del parallel close poble sec metro station hotel clean functional bathroom nice floor flooded shower beds hard hotel road noise zero outlook window corridor level echoy stair lift shaft noisy morning people traffic breakfast ok definitely stick continental avoid english breakfast elements desk staff nice helpful bags left safely day location little rough particularly threatening excellent metro service poble sec 46 bus runs airport stopping street placa espanya t10 ticket 10 zone 1 1hour 15 min rides 8 euros ticket shared lots info barcelona tourism site

Reviews.Title: “Small rooms, expensive breakfast/food”
Reviews.Author: indianUKdoctor
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights staff helpful decent size food expensive preferred eat outside disappointing hotel internet service waiting didnt carry own laptop service pc dead slow slower dial costs £2 20 mins absolute rip location wise bang opposite metro station close city centre overall avoid hotel

Reviews.Title: “welcoming,cenTRAL BUT NOT TOO CENTRAL”
Reviews.Author: agatwo
Reviews.Content: discovered barcelona mid nineties returned seven times times stayed silken concordia occasions struck friendliness staff recption resturant cleaning staff upstairs adequate size wise comfortable hotel situated ten fifteen minutes gentle stroll port five minutes direction brings plac de espanya magic fountains tourist attractions agreat stay

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable & Cheap. Splendid Experience”
Reviews.Author: mwc88
Reviews.Content: friend stopped hotel silken concordia tad nervous booked cheap didnt expect decent main lobby clean access internet hotel spacious plasma tv aircon actually downside hotel walk la ramblas dodgy night falls cheap bars restaurants avg parallel hotel situated money paid couldnt fault beds comfy aircon treat experiencing roasting temperatures barcelona definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Really pleasant good value hotel.”
Reviews.Author: monarlo
Reviews.Content: pros friendly helpful staff comfortable clean spacious 2030min walking distance beach town opposite metro station value money free internet cons lacking character atmosphere hotel neighbourhood summary pleased hotel night reasonable rate highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Good bargain !”
Reviews.Author: Candyfloss88
Reviews.Content: spend 4 nights reception staffs friendly helpful speaks english bathroom clean location bad metro station accross hotel food restaurant ok selections food choose overall im satisfied hotel

Reviews.Title: “Clean & comfortable, in good location”
Reviews.Author: AlanUK45
Reviews.Content: stayed nights prior joining cruise ship staff helpful clean comfortable floor front disturbed traffic noise breakfast buffet selection dinner evening fine except restaurant lacked atmosphere probably option short walk town spend amount traditional restaurant metro station outside hotel easy transport minor disappointment english speaking stations tv catch news

Reviews.Title: “good location at reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: minnie219
Reviews.Content: advantage hotel metro station street stops main searched hotel stay found ppl complaining noise issue hotel located city center 4 nights staying hoteli quiet sleep night found staff kinda friendly helpfulthey speak english help booked hotel stated wireless internet free public charged checked receptionist using charged wireless service kindly told cable internet service charge am thankful saving money def choose stay

Reviews.Title: “Adequate but wouldnt stay here again”
Reviews.Author: Karen90
Reviews.Content: 3rd hotel stayed barcelona wouldnt welcome functional receptionist barely speaking werent offered maps city told breakfast served sleepless night night stay window didnt close properly noise outside rumbled night hot water following morning complained receptionist moved improvement outside noise heard breakfast hot selection hot warmer underneath location central metro stop outside stayed hotel street previously stay hotel barcelona universal
